scripts.prep: bun run swagger && bun run openapi
scripts.build: bun run prep && bun --filter='@sparta/utils' --filter='@sparta/discord' run types && bun --filter='@sparta/scheduler' run build
scripts.start: bun run prep && bun run build && NODE_ENV='production' bun --filter='@sparta/api' --filter='@sparta/discord' run start
scripts.dev: bun run prep && bun run build && NODE_ENV='development' bun --env-file=.env --elide-lines=0 --filter='@sparta/api' --filter='@sparta/discord' run dev
scripts.dev:scheduler: bun run build && bun --env-file=.env --elide-lines=0 --filter='@sparta/scheduler' run dev
